title: MODEXTREME 1st Annual Meeting
description:
The first Annual Meeting of MODEXTREME project was held on January 26th and 27th, 2015, in Cordoba, Spain and was preceded and followed by workshops on January 22-23 and January 28-29, 2015.

 

Agenda

Day 1 (January 26)

08:00 – 08:30 Registration

08:30 – 09:30 Welcome and introduction (Room “Sala Mudejar”)
Chairing: Gianni Bellocchi

Address to participants from UCO
Gianni Bellocchi, Project coordinator (INRA)
Self-presentation of Stakeholder Platform members

09:30 – 10:00 Management issues 
Léa Tourneur (IT)

10:00 – 10:30 COFFEE-BREAK

10:30 – 13:00 Project advancements (Room “Sala Mudejar”)
(20 minutes presentation + 10 minutes discussion)
Chairing: Gianni Bellocchi
Secretary: Léa Tourneur

10:30 – 11:00 WP1 – Improving the capabilities of agro-meteorological models for extreme weather events
Luca Testi (UCO)

11:00 – 11:30 WP2 – Implementation of agro-meteorological models and extreme weather events capabilities
Marcello Donatelli (CRA)

11:30 – 12:00 WP3 – Climatic scenarios generation
Ole Christensen (DMI)

12:00 – 12:30 WP4 – Model evaluation
Oscar Rojas (FAO)

12:30 – 13:00 WP5 – Evaluation of new modelling approaches for short-term yield forecast and monitoring at EU level
Roberto Confalonieri (UNIMI)

******************************************************************
13:00 – 14:00 LUNCH
******************************************************************

14:00 – 17:30 Workshop (Room “Sala Mudejar”, Room “Sala de Juntas Baja Este”)(accomplishments, key bottlenecks, corrective actions, timeline)

14:00 – 16:00 WP1-WP2 – Dedicated software component for extreme events impact models
Chairing: Marcello Donatelli (CRA), François Tardieu (INRA)
Secretary: Simone Bregaglio (UNIMI)
Tasks: 1.2, 1.3, 2.1

16:00 – 16:30 COFFEE-BREAK

16:30 – 17:30 Report on the workshop and discussion

Evening SOCIAL EVENTS (guided tour, social dinner)

Day 2 (January 27)

08:30 – 09:30 Parallel meetings (Room “Sala Mudejar”)

Scientific Advisory Board meeting (restricted to S.A.B. members)

Executive Committee meeting (restricted to Ex.C. members)

09:30 – 10:00 COFFEE-BREAK

10:00 – 12:30 Workshop (Room “Sala Mudejar”)

WP2-WP3-WP4 – Model evaluation against historical datasets and future weather scenarios
Chairing: Marcello Donatelli (CRA), Ole Christensen (UCO), Oscar Rojas (FAO)
Secretary: Michela Marinelli (FAO)
Tasks: 2.2, 2.4, 3.1, 3.2, 4.1, 4.2

12:00 – 12:30 Report on the workshop and discussion

12:30 – 13:00 Feedback from Scientific Advisory Board members

******************************************************************
13:00 – 14:00 LUNCH
******************************************************************

14:00 – 16:00 Dissemination and extension activities (Room “Sala Mudejar”)

Chairing: Gianni Bellocchi
Secretary: Léa Tourneur

14:00 – 15:00 Dissemination plan
Ioannis Athanasiadis (DUTH)

15:00 – 16:00 Feedback from the Stakeholder Platform
DG AGRI, DG JRC, etc.

16:00 – 17:00 Wrap-up and end of the meeting
Gianni Bellocchi (INRA), Marcello Donatelli (CRA)

Ancillary events

January 22-23, 2015

Training on model implementation in the BioMA component-based architecture

Chairing: Marcello Donatelli (CRA)

Objectives: To prepare to the implementation of their own model components at fine granularity

Target participants: MODEXTREME modellers (tasks 1.2, 1.3) with the knowledge of a programming language, preferably object-oriented

January 28-29, 2015

Training on the use of modelling solutions in BioMA

Chairing: Marcello Donatelli (CRA)

Objectives: To prepare to the simulation of cropping systems of WP4

Target participants: MODEXTREME model users (tasks 4.1, 4.2)

Registration

The meeting is intended for the consortium members. To register, please access the registration form via the collaborative platform.
